semantic_identifier: [GOLD-43]: Define Messaging Library export data model and API contract
title: Define Messaging Library export data model and API contract

sections.text: Create a clear data model and API contract for exporting approved positioning assets (value props, differentiators, proof points, objections) from the Messaging Library to external sales/marketing tools. Specify required fields, versioning, approval state rules, and identifiers for mapping updates vs. new exports. Document the endpoints/payloads and expected auth method so subsequent implementation tickets can build against a stable spec.
